My Portfolio

2018

I was unsure on whether to include this as a work example or not because you are looking at it right now. But there are a few important things I would like to share. I used Git while building this site over the last few months and I got to know it a lot better now than when I stated. I also used SASS in the build process, having variables and reusable mixin's is very nice once you get used to it.

Future Plans

I plan to build upon and maintain this new portfolio site as a collection of my work - almost as a personal art gallery as much as it is a portfolio. I enjoy posting about these projects because it makes me revisit the work I did. It also gives me an oppertunity to critique my own work. Long term plan would be to use some sort of template engine to eliminate duplicate header, footer, menu code.
